description:
## 사건 정보

**사건명**: Com. v. Williams, D.
**판결일**: 2016-06-13
**법원**: Superior Court of Pennsylvania
**관할**: Pennsylvania, PA


## 판결문 요약

J-S49031-16


NON-PRECEDENTIAL DECISION - SEE SUPERIOR COURT I.O.P. 65.37

COMMONWEALTH OF PENNSYLVANIA,                    IN THE SUPERIOR COURT OF
                                                       PENNSYLVANIA
                            Appellee

                       v.

DAVID M. WILLIAMS,

                            Appellant                No. 3821 EDA 2015


               Appeal from the PCRA Order November 24, 2015
                In the Court of Common Pleas of Chester County
              Criminal Division at No(s): CP-15-CR-0001254-2014

BEFORE: PANELLA, J., OLSON, J., and STEVENS, P.J.E.*

MEMORANDUM BY STEVENS, P.J.E.:                        FILED JUNE 13, 2016

        Appellant David M. Williams files this pro se appeal from the order of

the Court of Common Pleas of Chester County dismissing Appellant’s petition

pursuant to the Post Conviction Relief Act (PCRA).1 As Appellant is no longer

serving a sentence for the relevant criminal charges, he is not entitled to

relief under the PCRA. Accordingly, we affirm.

        On April 29, 2014, Appellant was charged with Possession of a

Controlled Substance with Intent to Deliver, Possession of a Controlled

Substance, Possession of Drug Paraphernalia, and Resisting Arrest.2        On

September 24, 2014, Appellant entered a negotiated guilty plea to
____________________________________________


1
    42 Pa.C.S.A. §§ 9541-9546.
2
  35 P.S. § 780-113(A)(30), 35 P.S. § 780-113(A)(16), 35 P.S. § 780-
113(A)(...
